projects.title: Room Homepage
projects.description: This small homepage challenge packs a big punch to test your layout skills. There's also a slider in there to add a JS layer.
projects.info: A single page app built on html5, CSS and Vue CLI. It has a dynamic image gallery and an adaptable design to mobile devices. Implements some Vuejs basics, such as communication between components, events, data binding and Vue life cycle.

projects.title: E-commerce product page
projects.description: A single web page application built with angular. This app tests your JS skills with a lightbox product gallery and cart functionality.
projects.info: A single page app built on html5, CSS and Angular. It has a lightbox product gallery and cart functionality. It uses Angular material in its components and implements some basic Aangular fundamentals such as emitting data between components, event emitters and observables.

projects.title: IP address tracker
projects.description: This web page uses two separate APIs together to create an IP Address Tracking app.
projects.info: A single page app built on Angular. To get the IP Address locations, I used the IP Geolocation API by IPify, and Mapbox API To generate the map. Both API's has limited ammount of uses, so please use it carefully ;)

projects.title: Ping single column coming soon page
projects.description: Just a good chance to practice basic client-side form validation using Vue Library.
projects.info: This is a simple form-validation example on Vue. It receive an error message when the form is submitted if: The input field is empty or The email address is not formatted correctly.

projects.title: Frontend Web Developer Portfolio
projects.description: My developer portfolio. It's a fully responsive web page that compiles my work.
projects.info: A responsive web page built with Html5, CSS3. It has a logic layer built with modular design pattern in javascript.

projects.title: Huddle landing page with curved sections
projects.description: Practice using pseudo-elements for styling extras and the CSS position property for the sections with curved edges.
projects.info: A good challenge to practice CSS position property for the sections with curved edges. It implements a little form email validation in Javascript and uses modular pattern design.

projects.title: SNMP Temperature & Humidity Monitoring
projects.description: Web app for ambient condition measuring. It's connected to a backend Nodejs server that implements an npm package for SNMP monitoring.
projects.info: Frontend and backend Javascript app, created to help to monitoring ambient conditions in a datacenter. It's a Nodejs dockerized application that connect to temperature sensors via SNMP.

projects.title: Datacenter QR Code App.
projects.description: An useful app than generate QR codes. It has an API than serve data from a MySQL database.
projects.info: A private application made to make the register and access process to a datacenter easier. It also have a section to generate QR codes for tagging cargo.

projects.title: Datacenter keys code App.
projects.description: Simple UI than show information from a database.
projects.info: A private application made to make the register and access process to a datacenter easier. It also have a section to generate QR codes for tagging cargo.

projects.title: Single price grid component
projects.description: An small pricing component, perfect to practice your css Grid and flex-box skills.
projects.info: Just a simple web component built on Html and CSS. It was a perfect chance to practice and improve CSS BEM methodology skills.
